results.name: Numerators of partial sums of reciprocals of lcm(1..n) = A003418(n).
mathematica: q[x_] := Apply[LCM, Table[j, {j, 1, x}]] Table[Numerator[Apply[Plus, Table[1/q[w], {w, 1, m}]]], {m, 1, 30}]
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Oct 08 2001
